title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: September 18, 2023, 07:44:59 PMLast edit: September 18, 2023, 08:35:24 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night 228Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-fiziev-vs-gamrot/matchesMatches(2 points each)11. Rafael Fiziev vs. Mateusz Gamrot(must get 11 correct to proceed)10. Bryce Mitchell vs. Dan Ige9. Marina Rodriguez vs. Michelle Waterson-Gomez8. Bryan Battle vs. AJ Fletcher7. Ricardo Ramos vs. Charles Jourdain(1 point each)6. Dan Argueta vs. Miles Johns5. Tim Means vs. Andre Fialho 4. Jacob Malkoun vs. Cody Brundage3. Mohammed Usman vs. Jake Colier2. Mizuki Inoue vs. Hannah Goldy1. Montserrat Rendon vs. Tamires VidalNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example11. Rafael Fiziev 10. Bryce Mitchell 9. Marina Rodriguez 8. Bryan Battle 7. Ricardo Ramos 6. Dan Argueta 5. Tim Means 4. Jacob Malkoun 3. Mohammed Usman 2. Mizuki Inoue 1. Montserrat Rendon NOT go the Full Distance 6Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
